channel.title: CVE Feed for CRM Perks -- Database for Contact Form 7, WPforms, Elementor forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CRM Perks -- Database for Contact Form 7, WPforms, Elementor forms

item.title: CVE-2023-31212|2024-08-02T14:53:31.090Z -- crm%20perks -- database%20for%20contact%20form%207%2C%20wpforms%2C%20elementor%20forms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in CRM Perks Database for Contact Form 7, WPforms, Elementor forms contact-form-entries allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Database for Contact Form 7, WPforms, Elementor forms: from n/a through 1.3.0.
